mapper.update: update myiot_account set login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_status = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, login_name, `password`, login_status, create_time, update_time from myiot_account

SELECT a.user_id AS id, a.login_name AS accountName, b.name AS userName, b.mobile AS mobile, b.sex AS sex, b.dept_id AS depId, b.email AS email, b.remark AS remark, d.name AS depName FROM myiot_account a LEFT JOIN myiot_user b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN myiot_department d ON b.dept_id = d.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
